Commotion Wireless

es una herramienta de código abierto que utiliza teléfonos móviles, ordenadores y otros dispositivos para crear redes de malla inalámbricas de comunicación descentralizada.

Recent Blog Posts

Commotion Team participates in DC Internet Freedom Hack Day

January 14, 2014 critzo

On Saturday, January 11, 2014, members of the Commotion team joined two other open source projects, Cupcake and Cryptocat, at the DC Internet Freedom Hack Day, hosted by CommunityRED and OpenITP at 1776 in Washington, DC.

Commotion R1 Breaking Changes

January 10, 2014 danstaples

The latest Commotion release, R1 “Grumpy Cat”, builds upon and enhances features from previous Commotion releases. Although we strived to keep Commotion familiar and compatible with previous revisions wherever possible, R1 introduced significant changes that both users and developers should know about.

Commotion Router v1 Release Notes

December 30, 2013 Josh King

These are the release notes for Commotion Router v1 “Grumpy Cat”, available for download now. This is the first full version of the OpenWRT-based firmware for the Commotion project, which is intended to make it easy for communities to build their own communications technology and to serve as a platform for the development of novel and secure communication tools.

Get the lastest version of Commotion for your platform!
